desc: Redesigned and developed online academy website for Sepehr Academy and its admin panel with a small team using React.js, Axios, TailwindCSS and i designed user interface with Adobe XD myself. this website contained courses and course pages, login and register page, admin panel, articles, etc... also features like applying and cancelling courses by the students, ability to like articles and posting comments on courses, etc
Dadekav was a start-up that I was invited by one of my friends. Our project was about collecting Iranian and foreign APIs for the convenience of Iranian developers
